utside. A coach can coach others 
full-time or part-time in addition to having other responsibilities. A coach can be, but does not 
have to be, a senior member of the facility. Coaches can also come from a higher health admin-
istration level to support a number of facilities or districts with implementation of the Checklist.
Coaching involves observing others during a delivery to assess adherence to the Checklist.
